SEARCH
Module com.example.demo

Package com.example.demo.controller

package com.example.demo.controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AudioManager
    Manages the audio functionalities of the game, including background music and sound effects.
    Control_Animation
    Controller class responsible for handling animations and interactions of the plane, bullets, enemies, and boss in the game.
    Control_Control
    The Control_Control class manages the control panel in the game.
    Control_EndGameMenu
    The Control_EndGameMenu class handles the actions when the game ends.
    Control_Main
    The Control_Main class handles the main user interface of the game, including the buttons for starting the game, opening settings, and viewing control information.
    Control_PauseMenu
    The Control_PauseMenu class handles the functionality of the pause menu in the game.
    Control_Setting
    The Control_Setting class is responsible for managing the settings interface in the game.
    Control_Start
    The Control_Start class is responsible for controlling the game's start process, including launching and transitioning between levels.
    Main
    The main entry point of the Sky Battle game application.
